org.linqs.psl.reasoner.term

Interface VariableTermStore<T extends ReasonerTerm,V extends ReasonerLocalVariable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<T>, TermStore<T,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DCDMemoryTermStore, DCDStreamingTermStore, MemoryVariableTermStore, SGDMemoryTermStore, SGDStreamingTermStore, StreamingTermStore

    public interface VariableTermStore<T extends ReasonerTerm,V extends ReasonerLocalVariable>
extends TermStore<T,V>
    An interface for term stores that can handle some variable operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumVariables() 
      int getVariableIndex(V variable)
      Get the index that matches up to getVariableValues().
      Iterable<V> getVariables() 
      float[] getVariableValues()
      Get the truth values for variabe atoms.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Is the term store loaded, and can it give an accurate term and variable count.
      void syncAtoms()
      Ensure that all the variable atoms have the same value as the array returned by getVariableValues().

      • Methods inherited from interface org.linqs.psl.reasoner.term.TermStore

        add, clear, close, createLocalVariable, ensureCapacity, ensureVariableCapacity, get, noWriteIterator, size

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • getNumVariables

        int getNumVariables()

      • getVariables

        Iterable<V> getVariables()

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Is the term store loaded, and can it give an accurate term and variable count.

      • getVariableValues

        float[] getVariableValues()
        Get the truth values for variabe atoms. Changing a value in this array and calling syncAtoms() will change the actual atom's value.

      • getVariableIndex

        int getVariableIndex(V variable)
        Get the index that matches up to getVariableValues().

      • syncAtoms

        void syncAtoms()
        Ensure that all the variable atoms have the same value as the array returned by getVariableValues().
